text: Adelaide Jo찾o (born Maria da Gl처ria Pereira da Silva; 27 July 1921 - 3 February 2021) was a Portuguese actress. She was Lisbon, Portugal. Her career began in 1960. She starred in The End of the World, which was shown at the 1993 Cannes Film Festival.
